simple.HTML

Class MimeTypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.HTML.MimeTypes

  • public final class MimeTypes
extends Object
    This class reads a simple XML file containing MIME Type information and provides this information statically.
    File read: mimeTypes.conf.xml in the base package.
    depends on CIString, InlineLooseParser, Page, Tag, Uri, ReadWriterFactory, Log, LogFactory
    Created: Jul 25, 2006
    Author:
    Kenneth Pierce

      • getMimeFromContentType

        public static String getMimeFromContentType(String rawContent)
        Get's the MIME type from the raw header value. Some strange servers include extra after the mime.
        Parameters:
        rawContent -
        Returns:
        The MIME type.

      • getMime

        public static Vector<String> getMime(Uri url)
        Checks the URL to see what it's MIME is. Does not connect to the server.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to check.
        Returns:
        A Vector of MIME types. The Vector may be empty.

      • getMime

        public static Vector<String> getMime(String ext)
        Returns a vector of matching MIME types.
        Parameters:
        ext - The extension or file name.
        Returns:
        A vector of matching MIME types or an empty vector if none were found.
